channel.title: Awards
channel.description:
I don't think awards are given as often as they should. We have a lot that are never even used or seen anymore.
• Start the SOTW award for winners; giving a boost to the Graphics section • Return the "Moparscape Vet" • LPOTM, Batman, and all the "new" awards should be given out way more.
How exactly can these start to be given out more?

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

No replies for 3 days, marking this as resolved. If you want to continue discussing it, post it in the mod section.

Read full topic

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

the elve age:

I feel as if every single award though given here are mainly awards for the elitists. How exactly is the community suppose to get Moparscape Vet? By only the fact they’ve been here 3-6 years?

The Moparscape Vet is based on your community contributions, useful and informative posts and a vote ratio of 2:1+1 if you are suggested as far as I know. I also think 50 rep was a requirement however reputation is useless, so I doubt that matters.

Read full topic

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I feel as if every single award though given here are mainly awards for the elitists. How exactly is the community suppose to get Moparscape Vet? By only the fact they’ve been here 3-6 years?

Read full topic

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’m all for vet being brought back also. If we’re going to be more public about awards and such I think vet could turn out well. Pretty much what Davidi2 said.

Read full topic

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’d be for it. We’re starting to be much more public about awards and things like that, with more opportunities for people to get them I don’t see why Vet should still be hidden.

Read full topic

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well I wouldn’t mind getting some life back into the vet section, but the hybridscape section is definitely beyond saving.

[quote=“the elve age, post:3, topic:444145”]The 5-starred Moparscape Vet… The title disappeared, and I think it would be cool to start seeing it given out to those who’ve been here a while.

Those new awards we made, do you nominate individuals for the award?[/quote]

There were exact reasons why it was hidden in the first place. It may take a while to try and bring it back, but that’s only if we can get the right support for it. You are for it and casey might be, but we need a lot more support before we’ll try to revisit those original problems.

People may be nominated by others or staff members for those awards, but they are essentially handled the same as the mitb awards. All of them have been given out except ‘Java Coder,’ which is currently under scrutiny and may be removed in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

the moparscape vet section is another section that really just needs to be archived as its not used, same with the hybridscape section.

Read full topic

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

The 5-starred Moparscape Vet… The title disappeared, and I think it would be cool to start seeing it given out to those who’ve been here a while.

Those new awards we made, do you nominate individuals for the award?

Read full topic

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

SOTW and LPOTM will be up to how the new graphics board is run. Neither, one, or both will be used in the future. That’s not something I can really discuss.

Batman has traditionally been a very exclusive award. Only the most significantly contributors of the website have earned it. I would think it’s a bit too prestigious to give out right now (I can’t even think of any non-staff members that would deserve it, except maybe a few ex-staff).

Could you elaborate on your other points?

Read full topic
